Rule: whenever the code is referred to
whenever you see the medallion or someone talks about it
whenever you see the black pearl
when there's a sword fight, drink for each camera cut / shot
whenever Gibbs gives words of wisdom
whenever Elizabeth gets wet (water or other)
whenever Jack does a physically impossible stunt
whenever someone drinks on screen, drink with them
every ariel shot of a ship
every time something breaks on screen
every time the parrot does something
